query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: Data Collection Structure
result.description: A Data Collection Structure that is feasible and useful for Mortgage Lenders their UnderwritingRisk Management Departments and all other interested parties including the EEFIG DEEP database and EeDAP database This is the energy and nonenergy green performance data to be collected from participating residential projects and homeowners related to actual energy and energy costs realized after occupancy of renovated and new construction projects This includes specific instructions to be included in Green Mortgage Green Renovation Loan agreements between participant banks and their clients advising of the need to provide actual annual energy usage data Lead partner SKGBC M4

result.title: "All SMARTER Project Achievements posted on the ""SMARTER Finance for Families"" residential green finance online platform and communicated locally through established channels"
result.description: All SMARTER Project Achievements (e.g. banks announcing launch of their Green Mortgage / Green Renovation Loan programmes, Residential Investor/Developers announcing the Pre-Certification or Certification of their projects, GHSPs announcing their selection as a qualified green solution, etc. posted on the SMARTER Finance for Families residential green finance online platform and communicated locally through established channels (e.g. Implementing Partner websites and Energy Agencies websites- see Task 8.9) Lead partner: PLGBC (M24)

result.title: Catalogue of both common and country-specific barriers

result.title: Recommended Adjustments to incorporate the CEN and other related standards
result.description: Recommended Adjustments to incorporate the CEN and other related standards and acceptance of those adjustments into the EE/Green Homes certification tools in use by Implementing Partners during the pilot phase. These will be divided into all immediate adjustments that are feasible to implement during the SMARTER project period as well as (if necessary) a road map detailing how the Green Homes certifications will evolve over time.

result.title: Initial European-based and locally-based energy data examining risk of mortgage or loan default
result.description: Initial Europeanbased and locallybased energy data examining risk of mortgage or loan default for EEGreen vs nonEEGreen projects that is useful for Implementing Partner banks as well as suitable to contribute to ongoing relevant project efforts exploring mortgage and other finance risk such as the Energy Efficiency Financing Institutions Group EEFIG DEEP database and the EeMAP projects EeDAP database This data will be continuously augmented as new banking partners willing to analyse their mortgage and other loan portfolios join the SMARTER project Lead partner CZGBC M24

result.title: List of recommended research and other documentation for the European Advisory Board
result.description: List of recommended research and other documentation to inform the European Advisory Board of the current issues and objectives of Institutional Investors related to Green Homes, Green Mortgages and other Green Loans.
